column5: Hey,  Anyone have one of these units? I was just out cleaning up some stuff in the garage, and came across one that came with my boat when I bought it. I took it off right away, because at the time, I didn't know how to use it.  I just hooked it up to a battery, and it seems to be working.  Is this thing worth setting up for icefishing, or am I wasting my time? I've done a little research online, and came up with some positive info, just curious if anyone here actually has one, and has an opinion on it??  Sinker
Hmmmm......nobody here has used one of these before???  Crazy!!  Sinker

I don't have one of those units but I do have an FL8SE and to be honest I wouldn't go ice fishing without one again. In fact I'm thinking of putting it in my boat this summer for when I'm still fishing.
